Invited particpating expert in JECFA (Joint FAO/WHO expert committee on Food Additives) meetings/public organisation or FAO/WHO consultations. Acting as rapporteur or reviewer in exposure assessment for food additives, food contaminants and toxins as part of the final report adopted by the committee. Nature of advices delivered are like an opinion which are adressing risk assessment of substances for international risk managers within horizontal codex alimentarius committees (e.g food additives, food contaminants). no right to vote. no involvement in aspartame activities. indirect involvement (not drafting the exposure assessment, just participations to the discussion) in steviols exposure assessment, 2008.
